title: Hour 2 - Michael Lombardi tells Browns to go get Jimmy G
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Michael Lombardi tells Browns to go get Jimmy G
description:
Doug and Bucky, filling in for Dan, give their thoughts on Baker Mayfield taking over as QB1 for the Panthers and where that leaves Sam Darnold. Former NFL team executive Michael Lombardi joins Doug and Bucky to give his reaction to the Deshaun Watson settlement, what the Browns should do in the interim, Lamar Jackson's situation in Baltimore, and the other major headlines around the NFL.  Plus, Doug and Bucky talk about what the new massive Big10 media deal means for recruiting.

 

#DougGottliebShow

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
